name: d3-textwrap
author: Vijith Assar
description: wrap long lines of text using foreignObject tags or tspans as appropriate, depending on browser support

scripts.lint: eslint --config eslintrc.json src/*.js && eslint --config eslintrc.json test/*.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-selection:d3,d3-textwrap:d3 -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-textwrap.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-textwrap.js -c -m -o build/d3-textwrap.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-textwrap.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-textwrap.js build/d3-textwrap.min.js
